properties.name: dns.control-channel-port
properties.description: The port number for the control channel on the neighbouring interchange.

properties.name: dns.domain-name
properties.description: The domain name used in the interchange network.

properties.name: dns.initial-delay
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, from application start-up to DNS lookup starts.

properties.name: dns.lookup-interval
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, between each DNS lookup.

properties.name: dns.mock-names
properties.description: The interchanges to be returned by the MockDNSFacade. Used for testing.

properties.name: discoverer.capabilities-update-interval
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, between each capability post to neighbours.

properties.name: discoverer.capability-post-initial-delay
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, from application start-up to first capability exchange.

properties.name: discoverer.subscription-poll-initial-delay
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, from application start-up to first attempt at polling subscriptions.

properties.name: discoverer.subscription-poll-update-interval
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, between each attempt at polling a subscription.

properties.name: discoverer.subscription-polling-number-of-attempts
properties.description: Number of times we are allowed to poll one subscription.

properties.name: discoverer.subscription-request-initial-delay
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, from application start-up to subscription request.

properties.name: discoverer.subscription-request-update-interval
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, between each attempt at posting a subscription request.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.check-interval
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, between each lookup of failed neighbours in the database.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.check-offset
properties.description: Time, in milliseconds, from application startup until lookup for failed neighbours in the database.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.number-of-attempts
properties.description: Number of times we are allowed to reattempt a POST or a GET to a failed neighbour.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.random-shift-upper-limit
properties.description: The upper limit, in milliseconds, of the random shift used in backoff POST and GET.

properties.name: graceful-backoff.start-interval-length
properties.description: The length, in milliseconds, of the base waiting time of backoff.
